MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL23 postcode area of Bala, affecting properties in High street and surrounding streets. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4PM  due to a piece of faulty equipment on the electrical network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:31PM on 12TH November 2020.
